source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a static, scenic shot of a city skyline at sunset. The vast sky is filled with dramatic, scattered clouds painted in warm hues of orange, yellow, and soft grey. Below, the silhouette of the city includes various buildings and lush treetops, creating a tranquil urban landscape under the colorful evening sky.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.initial_feedback: The video does not match the description of a static shot. Instead, the camera is unsteady, panning to the right and slightly rotating. camera是运动的但是scene景色是静止的
source_caption_data.gpt_feedback: The video does not align with the description of a static shot. Instead, the camera is unsteady, panning to the right and slightly rotating. While the scene itself is stationary, the camera movement creates a dynamic effect.
source_caption_data.final_feedback: The video does not align with the description of a static shot. Instead, the camera is unsteady, panning to the right and slightly rotating. While the scene itself is stationary, the camera movement creates a dynamic effect.

generated_critique: The caption incorrectly describes the video as a static shot, as the camera is not stationary.
